fields.tooltip_text: Define if hook will block flow in case cancellation

fields.label: General Settings
fields.tooltip: These fields determine how the plugin is triggered and basic behavior.

fields.label: Login Service
fields.label_tooltip: This field determines the URL for the web service in charge of the login flow.

fields.label: Screen Design and Text
fields.tooltip: These fields affect the design of the main screen plugin.

fields.label: Login Title Text
fields.label_tooltip: Main text at the right of the screen. Preferably use to depict the name of the app or welcome the user.

fields.label: Main Description Text
fields.label_tooltip: This text can be used to give a brief introduction to the product.
fields.initial_value: Helping companies maximize any cloud infrastructure, reduce costs, increase engagement, and significantly improve time to market and speed of ongoing innovation.
fields.placeholder: Helping companies maximize any cloud infrastructure, reduce costs, increase engagement, and significantly improve time to market and speed of ongoing innovation.

custom_configuration_fields.label_tooltip: Please upload a zip file to provide the design assets for this plugin. For guidance and proper naming of the assets, please refer to this resource.
